thread.title: BRIEF-China Unicom Hong Kong Ltd Says Jan ‍Aggregate Number Of Mobile Billing Subscribers 287.035 Mln​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-China Unicom Hong Kong Ltd Says Jan ‍Aggregate Number Of Mobile Billing Subscribers 287.035 Mln​

organizations.name: brief-china unicom hong kong ltd says jan ‍aggregate number of mobile billing subscribers

text:
Feb 22 (Reuters) - China Unicom Hong Kong Ltd:
* JAN ‍ AGGREGATE NUMBER OF MOBILE BILLING SUBSCRIBERS 287.035 MILLION​
* JANUARY NET ADDITION OF MOBILE BILLING SUBSCRIBERS FOR MONTH 2.872 MILLION
* JAN ‍AGGREGATE NUMBER OF FIXED-LINE BROADBAND SUBSCRIBERS 77.040 MILLION​
* JAN ‍ FIXED-LINE BUSINESS AGGREGATE NUMBER OF LOCAL ACCESS SUBSCRIBERS 59.483 MILLION​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
